Bash(bash -c '
# Variable setup from top of file
CURRENTDIR=$\(pwd\)
TARGETDIR=""/usr/local""
STOWDIR=""/usr/local/stow""
TMPDIR=""$HOME/build""

sudo mkdir -p $STOWDIR
sudo chown -R ""$USER"":""$USER"" $TARGETDIR $STOWDIR
sudo chmod -R 755 $TARGETDIR

# Install lua-language-server from source
PACKAGE=""lua-language-server""
sudo rm -rf ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE""
sudo rm -rf ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE""
mkdir -p ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE""
git clone https://github.com/LuaLS/lua-language-server.git ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE""
cd ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE"" || exit
git submodule update --depth 1 --init --recursive
./make.sh
# Copy the entire build output to stow directory
sudo cp -r ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/bin"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/""
sudo chmod 755 ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/bin/$PACKAGE""
cd ""$CURRENTDIR"" || exit
stow -vv -d ""$STOWDIR"" -t ""$TARGETDIR"" ""$PACKAGE""
')

Bash(bash -c '
TARGETDIR=""/usr/local""
STOWDIR=""/usr/local/stow""
TMPDIR=""$HOME/build""
PACKAGE=""lua-language-server""

# Remove old stow and re-stow properly
stow -vv -D -d ""$STOWDIR"" -t ""$TARGETDIR"" ""$PACKAGE"" 2>/dev/null || true
sudo rm -rf ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE""
mkdir -p ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/bin""

# Copy binary
sudo cp ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/bin/lua-language-server"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/bin/""
sudo chmod 755 ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/bin/lua-language-server""

# Copy required runtime files to stow root
sudo cp ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/main.lua"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/""
sudo cp ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/debugger.lua"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/""
sudo cp -r ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/locale"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/""
sudo cp -r ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/script"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/""
sudo cp -r ""$TMPDIR/$PACKAGE/meta"" ""$STOWDIR/$PACKAGE/""

stow -vv -d ""$STOWDIR"" -t ""$TARGETDIR"" ""$PACKAGE""
')
